column1: Nancy Pelosi says she wants to help Americans in the fight against #COVID — but tens of thousands of small businesses could close permanently if she doesn’t put partisan politics aside.  Speaker Pelosi it's time to act. We must release the BILLIONS of unused #PPP funds NOW.

It has been EIGHT MONTHS since we passed bipartisan COVID relief.   Rather than release already-passed #PPP funding Nancy Pelosi has refused choosing to play politics instead.   We cannot mess with Americans' livelihoods like this.   They need our help and they need it now!

GREAT NEWS: @pfizer has applied for @US_FDA approval.  If approved the first U.S. #COVID19 vaccine could be ready for distribution as early as December 11.  With 70% of the population getting this vaccine Pfizer says the world will be "back to normal" by May. https://t.co/GCoDYV4nQM

First the #WHO covered up for #China's lies. Now it's trying to undermine our ability to combat #COVID19.  Americans should have every possible treatment including Remdesivir at their disposal as we fight COVID. https://t.co/vWeZo7M8ov

For retirees the #coronavirus stimulus package:  ➡️ Prevents forced cash-outs of retirement accounts ➡️ Waives penalties on withdrawing money from one’s 401(k) or IRA for coronavirus-related needs

For employers the #coronavirus stimulus package:  ➡️ Delays payment of 2020 payroll taxes until 2021 or 2022 ➡️ Gives 50% credit on up to $10k of employee wages ➡️ Allows businesses to carry back losses for immediate tax refunds

For Americans the #coronavirus stimulus package provides: ➡️ Up to $1200 to individuals with earnings of $75000 or less ➡️ Up to $2400 to married couples filing jointly with earnings of $150000 or less ➡️ $500 extra for each child
